name: Tozoa #4
description:
“Tozoa”
10 NFT series
3277x4096px
 
NFT collectors that obtain a coveted "Tozoa" NFT will possess the ability to not get angry when someone cuts them off while they are driving.
 
"Tozoa" also proved effective against fighting feelings of restlessness and irritation usually associated with being stuck in Los Angeles traffic.
 
Vital signs monitoring devices were secretly installed in test subjects' cars. My assistants and I drove like maniacs around subjects while recording readings
 
Tozoa's calming effects weaken if property damage is caused by reckless driving. Which we discovered when my assistant was punched in the face by multiple subjects.
 
Please direct message me on Twitter @Microgemanisms after purchase.
